title: Available Immediately - New Construction Luxury 5BD/2BA!
description:
Available Now! Large brand new five-bedroom, two full bathroom apartment on historic Cecil B. Moore Avenue in the center of Brewerytown's renaissance. This ground-floor unit features 15-foot ceilings, an in-unit washer & dryer, central air/heat, stainless steel appliances, hardwood floors, on-street parking, a kitchen island with counter seating, tiled bathrooms, exposed brick, & intercom system all wrapped up in a beautiful open + modern layout. The unit is within direct walking distance to everything Temple University, and walking distance to the restaurants, bars, bottle shops, fitness facilities, tattoo studios, and more new things to come in the flourishing Brewerytown neighborhood. Hop the #3 bus at the corner for a quick commute to Temple or the Broad Street Subway for Center City; the exciting Kensington/Fishtown neighborhoods are a short trip away as well. Walk South to explore Girard Ave or take a short Uber or Lyft drive into Center City. Fairmount Park is nearby so walk to take advantage of all urban outdoor amenities (golf & batting ranges, Ultimate Frisbee, basketball & tennis courts). Schedule your showing today!

title: Center of town with one off-street Parking spot
description:
Spacious historic 2 bedroom apartment spanning 4 floors now available in the heart of Lambertville! Built in 1863, this historic brick federal style building retains many of its original features including beautiful pumpkin pine floors, winding stairs and hand made doors and hardware. The corner location gives you amazing light with gently cross breezes. Included with the apartment is a single off-street parking spot and on-site laundry. Located on the corner of Church and George streets you are steps away from everything Lambertville has to offer.
The building is shared by one other tenant on the ground floor. A professional services office that is open from 9-5 daily, closed on weekends.
Available on September 1st.
Spanning four floors! The apartment includes:
• 1755 Sq/ft
• 2 Bedrooms
• Bonus 4th floor attic room (Home office, studio, yoga or meditation room)*
• 1 Bathroom
• Large Livingroom
• Eat in Kitchen
- Gas range
- Under sink 5 filter reverse osmosis water filtration system
- SMEG refrigerator
- Dishwasher
- Pantry closet
• (NEW) Washer and Dryer
• One Off-street parking spot!
• Standing AC units for Living room, bedrooms and bonus room.
*Due to zoning laws the attic room can not be used as a bedroom
Recent updates:
• Freshly painted top to bottom
• Floors refinished
• New Washer and Dryer
• 5 filter reverse osmosis water filtration system under kitchen sink
• New fire/carbon monoxide detectors throughout
Please note that additional building renovations are planned for the near future.
Details:
• $2,750/month rent + 1 month rent as security deposit
• 1 year lease minimum
• Tenant pays - electric, gas, water and optional cable/internet
• Owner pays - sewer and trash/recycling pickup
• Tenant responsible snow removal of parking spot
• Pets are welcome!
• No smoking
Requirements:
• Credit check will be required of all applicants
• Proof of renters insurance before occupancy

title: No lease. Weekly rates starting at $590.
description:
A budget-friendly extended stay hotel in Bethlehem, PA
We invite you to experience the conveniences of home at WoodSpring Suites® Allentown Bethlehem. Our all-suite hotel with in-room kitchens is the perfect choice for your extended stay, whether it’s for a week, a month, or longer. We offer low nightly, weekly, and monthly hotel rates to help save you money. Plus, you'll enjoy free WiFi, guest laundry facilities and free parking at our 100% smoke-free, pet-friendly property, making your stay simple and hassle-free.
You'll enjoy quick access to a variety of destinations and attractions when you stay at our hotel in Bethlehem, Pennsylvania. If you’d like to take advantage of public transportation, we're right on the 108, 217, 319, and 327 local LANta bus routes, while the Amtrak Bus Station is just 6 miles away. We're about 8 miles from the Lehigh Valley International Airport/ABE Airport. $50 to $100 Deposit.
Hotel at a Glance
5 miles to Lehigh Valley Hospital Muhlenberg
6 miles to St. Luke’s Hospital Anderson Campus
6 miles to Greyhound and Amtrak stations
8 miles to Lehigh Valley International Airport
Nightly, weekly and monthly hotel rates
Full kitchen in every room
Guest Rooms
Visit our extended stay hotel and select the suite layout that meets your needs. Each layout features a combination of double-/full-sized beds and sleeper sofas, as well as a dresser, nightstand and shelves. All suites also include a kitchen with full-size refrigerator, stovetop, microwave, cupboards and prep sink. Sit back and relax during your stay while enjoying free WiFi and a flat-screen TV with cable/satellite and a premium movie channel. Every-other-week housekeeping services are provided for long-stay guests. Additional items—including a linen exchange, cookware, dishes, and more frequent housekeeping—are available for purchase at the front desk.
Explore activities for all ages in Allentown Bethlehem
You're in the heart of it all when you stay at WoodSpring Suites in Allentown Bethlehem, where you'll find a variety of exciting attractions and destinations. History buffs will enjoy visiting the nearby Pennsbury Manor, the reconstructed estate of William Penn, who founded the Pennsylvania colony. We're also an easy drive to a number of family friendly activities, including Crayola Experience, Dorney Park and Wildwater Kingdom, and Lehigh Valley Zoo. Artists and creative types will want to check out the Banana Factory Arts Center, a collection of galleries and arts programs partly housed in a former banana distribution warehouse, about 9 miles away.
Show Less
Pet Policy
Service animals are welcome at no additional charge, must be registered at front desk. Limit 2 dogs, under 75 lbs. per room. No cats. Non-refundable pet fees, 50 USD a pet reg fee and 10 USD a pet per night charge for the duration of the stay.
Hotel Alert: Some hotel features and amenities may be modified or unavailable due to COVID-19. For more information, please call your hotel directly.
Amenities to help you stay awhile
WoodSpring Suites is an extended stay hotel with clean and comfortable rooms, and a professional, friendly staff that’s available to assist you 24 hours a day, 7 days a week. Our 100% smoke-free hotel offers pet-friendly hotel rooms, free parking, guest laundry facilities and conveniently located vending machines. Daily, weekly and monthly hotel rates are available.

description: Welcome home to 601 S Warren Ave. This charming 4 bedroom, 2.5 bathroom detached Colonial home in the Malvern area is fully-fenced in on an over 1-acre lot that has an amazing outdoors with plush trees which provide loads of privacy and views of nature's natural beauty. You’ll also find your large laundry/mud room with access to your 2-Car garage & side door within this level. On the second level, there is first your primary bedroom with an ensuite bathroom with 2 closets, and 3 nicely-sized bedrooms with a full hall bathroom. The home is within 0.9 miles of Malvern train station, 1 mile to the elementary school, and is across from Malvern Prep lake. This home is just waiting for you!

title: For Rent Home in Springfield Township
description:
For Rent in Springfield Township, Montgomery County...
Beautifully sleek and completely renovated four bedroom, two full bathrooms home with an atypically large fenced rear yard and garage. The massive rear addition expands this home into approximately 2,000 sq ft. plus a partially finished basement which makes it much larger than appears from the street. Enter through the custom living/mudroom that includes coat closet, newly-built storage bench with hooked wall organization system allowing you to leave all your needs by the door ready for tomorrow's game, work and school day. A sprawling Family Room/Den is finished with large windowed views of the rear deck/yard and accented by two overhead skylights allowing for the sun and stars. The fully renovated kitchen with upgraded appliances is expansive with more than enough cabinetry, granite counters, and includes a breakfast bar overlooking the family room/den. New flooring throughout, soft close drawers and doors, pendant lighting, recessed lighting, custom chandelier and more are subtle features that enhance this gorgeous home. The first floor also offers a bedroom/convertible room which could be used for home office, game room, arts and crafts, studio or whatever you desire. Complementing this room is a smooth faced full bathroom with white subway tile and modern glass encased oversized stall shower. Access the deck and backyard through the first floor rear mudroom alcove completed with custom built wood storage bench and closet. The second floor offers three truly large bedrooms with either deep or multiple closets, new lustrous gray carpeting, new doors, and new trim. The second floor full bathroom has set-in tub with white subway tile and industrial style sliding glass door. A hallway linen closet completes the sleeping quarters. The basement level is partially finished with vinyl flooring, custom storage shelves and recessed lighting. The functional laundry room is partially finished with washer/dryer hookup, large storage closet and custom platform built for all your laundering needs.  Walking distance to all Springfield Township School District Schools, as well as the main shopping artery including pharmacy, Night Life Ice Cream, cleaners, and car wash. A skip away from two grocery stores, Wawa, three gas stations, a movie theatre, limitless options of banks and much more! Neighboring Chestnut Hill and access to Rt 309, PA Turnpike, and other important travel routes. Bus and Train nearby for commuters. Newly paved driveway, new siding and capping, new roof, new front porch railing, lighting fixtures, mailbox, and front door, modern windows, new deck, new interior fit and finish, new flooring, new recessed lighting, new custom woodwork, two new bathrooms, new flooring throughout, new kitchen, new basement finish. New mini-split heat/A/C.
Credit checks will be required.  Security Deposit, first and last month rent due upon lease signing.  NO Pets allowed.

I'd like to be spending around $700/month with utilities. Along bus routes is a plus, or strong walk-ability score.

I am a young 60-year-old Yankee originally from New Jersey but have lived in Cape Cod Massachusetts for 25 years. My kids are all gone and I don't see them much, so I might as well move on. I am a professional satellite technician working on military contracts. I am also a CCTV expert. I've always dreamed about packing up and blazing a new trail. I've lived in a giant mansion that I built for 24 years, but now with the kids gone, it is just a ton of work. I hate Massachusetts. The people here suck, very unfriendly. I am certain I've had enough. It's time to move on. If you are looking for someone "normal", whatever that means. or should I say, old-fashioned, then that would be me? I guess. I don't smoke or drink. I work out a lot to stay fit. I have a lot of money and I earn big dollars. I am certain I would make a fantastic roommate. I do have a well-behaved dog named Frankie. he is a good fellow. I'd prefer that country setting, but I'm open to city life because I can make more money there. If I sound like someone you can deal with, then I would love to hear from you. Call me anytime. my name is Tom. Thanks for considering me.
Hi all,
I'm relocating to Cary or Chapel Hill to finish (maybe) my PhD and a novel.
I'm an older , retired Army Ranger, politically liberal, ultra endurance athlete, straight, but couldn't care less what you are as long as you're kind.
Looking for something close to downtown or a shopping center since I probably won't buy a car for a while.
September or October occupancy would be fine.
At least initially, I'll be home a lot (working online), but I'm super quiet and neat.
If you need help taking care of someone, we could work something out.
Furnished with WiFi please.
I don't smoke, drink, or do any kind of drug and wouldn't do well in a party house.
(I'm vaccinated & had 2 boosters but still take Covid very seriously; I was in NYC when the enormous white circus tents were put up around every hospital to handle the overflow of patients and refrigerated trucks parked for the dead)
Please just let me know the specifics of your situation and the total monthly cost including utilities. Of course, photos are really important.
(I've had a ton of data mining scams from this post. If you REALLY have something, please just answer the ad rather than asking me to text or call you).

title: Beautiful 4 bedrooms with yard and basement
description:
Beautiful 4 bedrooms and 2 full baths. Constructed in 2010, it features a modern kitchen with updated appliances and granite counter tops, hardwood floors, spacious bedrooms and bathrooms, washer/dryer and security system. There is a large full basement and great outdoor space in the fenced backyard. It takes up the first floor and half the second floor of the building.
With a large living space, basement and back yard, this apartment is perfect for entertaining guests!
Located in the Temple U area, it is a busy area, with a lot of foot traffic. Safety considerations include a security system. The local police station is nearby at 1747 N 17th Street (22nd District). The Philly police and Temple U police patrol the street. Because of the large number of students and recent grads in the area, it is a noisy area. The people upstairs are students. It is a nice safe and social area, so very attractive in that regard, but not appropriate for people seeking a quiet, sedate setting.
There is easy access to buses and the Broad Street Line, walking distance to the Liacouras Center, The Met, supermarkets, restaurants and other amenities.
Owner pays water. Tenant(s) pay electricity, cable and internet. Pet friendly, allowing one cat or small dog, with additional non-refundable pet deposit of $300.
The lease can begin August 15 to September 1, and will run through July 31, 2023. An application is required, but there is no charge. You must provide SSN and consent to a background check. We also need 2 recent pay stubs, and a W-2 or 1099 from 2021. If you are younger and do not have this, we may need a parent or guardian to co-sign.

title: Cute Cat Friendly Apartment with New Kitchen
description:
The apartment is a mother-in-law suite, which means you go through the owners house to get to the apartment. Because of that, we are being really careful who we rent to. We would prefer a couple or single person, who loves their own space, but will respect our space as they go through. No parties are allowed. The rent is lower than normal for this size apartment.
Huge One bedroom apartment with an extra room that can be curtained off or used as a den. The apartment has tons of gorgeous natural light. There are six closets in the apartment so it has a lot of storage. Hardwood floors through out. Balcony overlooking the corner of 48th and Cedar.
New kitchen with granite countertops, subway tile, and appliances. Garage disposal too.
Cats are ok, but no dogs. We have a dog though so you must like dogs.
There is a Washer and Dryer in the building. Tenants pay electrical and gas. Gas bill is only for the stove.
This apartment is a block from Baltimore Avenue, 4 blocks from Clark Park, a block from Mariposa Grocery store, Local Pez, Gold Standard, and near many restaurants and bars. Its a great family friendly neighborhood with large trees.
Call Mike to set up an appointment. No calls before 9 am or after 9 pm
